name: Obey The Law
description:
In this tactical shooter you lead a special police task force. Your missions include counter-terrorism, hostage rescue, and targeting organized crime.

Use your voice to issue commands to your squad or to hostages. Order you team to clear rooms or provide cover for you.



Choose from a wide variety of weapons like rifles, electric tasers, knives, sledge hammers, or grenades.



Internet connection for Voice Recognition is required.
The game is fully playable without Voice Recognition.
